Articles.Content:
So while I was bored waiting for 1-point-friggin-zero to release \*verysoon I decided to try and remake ULA's new Vulcan Rocket in KSP 

If you don't know what the Vulcan rocket is you can find out here:

[http://spaceflightnow.com/2015/04/13/ula-unveils-its-future-with-the-vulcan-rocket-family/](http://spaceflightnow.com/2015/04/13/ula-unveils-its-future-with-the-vulcan-rocket-family/)

Basically it is a heavy payload rocket where the most expensive part of the rocket is reusable - only the do this in a much simpler way than SpaceX using parachutes.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/z1e9zcD-KQg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
